derived_insights_only: Derived wellness insights — never raw logs or PHI
fwi_desc: A composite score reflecting overall wellness patterns
trend_desc: 14-30 day patterns in sleep, activity, and adherence
adherence_desc: Behavioral consistency indicators across wellness categories
status_desc: Quick indicators of whether a patient is thriving or struggling
privacy_boundaries: These privacy boundaries are enforced by the system
raw_logs: Raw activity logs and timestamped entries
meal_details: Specific meal details and food choices
mood_logs: Personal mood logs and journal content
medical_vault: Medical Vault documents and uploaded files
consent_statement: I understand and consent to sharing my derived wellness insights with this professional. I can revoke access at any time.
clinician_invite_desc: Share your functional wellness patterns with a clinician you trust. They will see your FWI, trends, and adherence signals — not your raw logs, journals, or Medical Vault.
share_with_clinician: Share this code with your clinician
no_raw_logs_vault: Raw logs, journals, or Medical Vault
coach_invite_desc: Share your functional wellness patterns with a coach you trust. They will see your FWI, trends, and adherence signals — not your raw logs, journals, or Medical Vault.
